thread.title: Shay Mooney and Hannah Billingsley Welcome Son Asher James
thread.title_full: Shay Mooney and Hannah Billingsley Welcome Son Asher James

author: Jen Juneau
title: Shay Mooney and Hannah Billingsley Welcome Son Asher James
text:
Shay Mooney and Hannah Billingsley are parents! 
The Dan + Shay singer-songwriter and former Miss Arkansas, both 25, welcomed their first child, son Asher James Mooney , on Tuesday, Jan. 24, the couple announced on Instagram. 
â€œItâ€™s hard to describe the love you feel for the first time when you hold your child. I will never be the same,â€ he captioned a family photo . â€œAsher James, I promise to be the father you deserve. And Hannah, I promise to be the husband you want and need. I love you both so much. Youâ€™ve given me everything I never knew I needed. Welcome to the world Asher James Mooney. 1/24/2017â€ A photo posted by Shay Mooney (@shaymooney) on Jan 24, 2017 at 3:58pm PST A photo posted by Shay Mooney (@shaymooney) on Jan 24, 2017 at 7:48am PST Here we go! ğŸ¤˜ğŸ»ğŸ˜ğŸ‘¶ğŸ» 
â€” Shay Mooney (@ShayMooney) January 24, 2017 
â€œThe time is nigh. #AsherJames,â€ Mooney captioned a hospital snap of the parents pre-birth on Tuesday morning. â€œHere we go!â€ 
The engaged couple announced they were expecting their first child in October, both sharing a photo of the couple holding up a onesie that said, â€œIâ€™m With the Band.â€ 
â€œGonna have a new band member in the Mooney family â€¦ 2017 is gonna be the start of our best adventure yet!â€ Mooney captioned the heartwarming photo on his Instagram account. â€œMini Mooney is comin in hot. I love you @hannah.billingsley.â€ 
Billingsley made her baby bump debut shortly thereafter at Novemberâ€™s CMA Awards, where she wore a form-fitting gown with shimmering appliques. A photo posted by Shay Mooney (@shaymooney) on Dec 24, 2016 at 12:24pm PST A photo posted by Shay Mooney (@shaymooney) on Oct 8, 2016 at 8:55am PDT 
The twosome shared they were expecting a son around Christmas time, giving their social media followers a glimpse at Billingsleyâ€™s stunning fall maternity shoot. 
â€œWe canâ€™t wait to meet you Asher James. I already love you more than I thought I was capable of. Seeya soon little man,â€ Mooney captioned one photo of his bride-to-be, dressed in a gorgeous white gown and staring off into the distance as she cradles her baby bump. 
â€œAsher â€“ A name meaning fortunate; blessed; happy one.. @shaymooney and I are all of those things and more,â€ Billingsley wrote next to a similar shot . â€œGod has truly honored us with the privilege of being the parents of this sweet boy.â€ Reporting by SARAH MICHAUD
